testsuite.name: POST /auth/logout

testcase.name: should extract Bearer token, pass it to LogoutUserService and return 204
should treat non-Bearer Authorization header as null token and return 204
should accept missing Authorization header, send null token and return 204
should treat blank header as null token and return 204
